problems.title: Hose Cracked / Leaking
problems.description: Hose has split near the handle.
solution_steps: Bissell does not sell the hose separately (requires unit disassembly).
Many users use tape or buy a donor unit for parts.

problems.title: Dirty Water Tank Leaking
problems.description: Leaking from the bottom of the tank.
possible_causes: Rubber gasket seal lost or damaged
solution_steps: Check the black rubber plug on the bottom.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a SpotClean Pro Portable (3624)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $315 vacuum, and extending the life of your Bissell is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my SpotClean Pro Portable (3624) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include reduced performance and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my SpotClean Pro Portable (3624) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
